concept.title: RabbitMQ Producer
concept.shortdesc: RabbitMQ Producer writes AMQP messages to a single RabbitMQ queue.

conbody.p: destinationsRabbitMQ ProducerRabbitMQ Producer destinationsoverviewWhen you configure the destination, you specify the information needed to connect to RabbitMQ client. You also define a queue and the bindings to use. You can use multiple bindings to write messages to one or more exchanges. You can optionally configure AMQP message properties.
You can add custom configuration options and define connection credentials as needed.
